org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.metadata

Class HiveException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.metadata.HiveException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HiveAccessControlException, HiveAuthzPluginException, HiveFatalException, InvalidTableException, LockException, SemanticException

    @InterfaceAudience.Public
 @InterfaceStability.Stable
public class HiveException
extends Exception
    Generic exception class for Hive.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public HiveException(Throwable cause,
                     String remErrMsg,
                     ErrorMsg errorMsg,
                     String... msgArgs)
        This is the recommended constructor to use since it helps use canonical messages throughout and propagate remote errors.
        Parameters:
        errorMsg - Canonical error message
        msgArgs - message arguments if message is parametrized; must be null is message takes no arguments
